question: From the perspective of the little girl standing in front of the man, which <ATT>party item</ATT> is <REL>farthest</REL> and located <POS>to the right</POS> of her? <choice>(a) cake, (b) camera, (c) party plate, (d) flower</choice> And provide the bounding box coordinate of the region related to your answer.
rationale: The question is ego-centric: The little girl in front of the man has her right side corresponding to the left side of the image. The cake and the camera are positioned in front of her, and the party plate is on her left side. Therefore, the flower is the farthest among the party items.

question: From the perspective of the little girl, who is the person <REL>closest</REL> <POS>behind her</POS> wearing <ATT>light-colored clothes</ATT>? <choice>(a) checkered shirt man, (b) grey shirt man, (c) black clothes woman, (d) flower vase</choice> And provide the bounding box coordinate of the region related to your answer.
rationale: The question is ego-centric: The flower vase is not a person, so it is excluded first. From the little girl’s perspective, the woman in black clothes is positioned farthest behind her. The man in the checkered shirt is wearing light-colored clothing but is not the closest. Therefore, the man in the grey shirt is the correct answer.

question: When I'm sitting on the right side of the large sofa, which <ATT>square or rectangular object</ATT> on the <POS>right side of the room</POS> is <REL>farthest from me</REL>? <choice>(a) fan, (b) large bottle, (c) shoe, (d) tv</choice> And provide the bounding box coordinate of the region related to your answer.
rationale: The question is ego-centric: From the person’s perspective, sitting on the right side of the large sofa corresponds to sitting on the left side of the large sofa in the image, and the person’s right side aligns with the left side of the image. The large bottle and shoe are located on the person’s left side, while the fan is on the right but is not a square-shaped object. Therefore, the TV is the correct answer.

question: When I’m sitting on the far right side of the long sofa, which <ATT>green object</ATT> is the <REL>highest in position</REL> <POS>on the left side</POS>? <choice>(a) frame, (b) audio, (c) green plate, (d) green vase </choice> And provide the bounding box coordinate of the region related to your answer.

question: From the perspective of the man sitting in front of the window, which object is the <REL>farthest</REL> <POS>in front of him</POS> and <ATT>rectangular</ATT>? <choice>(a) clock, (b) book, (c) green bottle, (d) red cup</choice> And provide the bounding box coordinate of the region related to your answer.
